Judul: CONSUMER ACCEPTANCE ON PLASTIC BAG USAGE
Abstrak: In this research, researcher wants to know the acceptance from people in general, consumer in focus towards Green Bag product. The acceptance could be measure by many things. In this research, researcher used 3 variables to measure the acceptance, which are product characteristics, adoption rate, and communication strategy.
Kontributor / Dosen Pembimbing: Pembimbing: DR. Mustika Sufiati Purwanegara, M.Sc.
Kata Kunci: Global Warming, Green Bag, Consumer Acceptance, Perception
